Sql.query: insert into tr_observacion( obscancodi, obscanusucreacion, obscanusumodificacion, obscanfeccreacion, obscanfecmodificacion, obscanestado, obscancomentario, obscantipo, emprcodi, obscanproceso, obscancomentarioagente ) values( :obscancodi, :obscanusucreacion, :obscanusumodificacion, :obscanfeccreacion, :obscanfecmodificacion, :obscanestado, :obscancomentario, :obscantipo, :emprcodi, :obscanproceso, :obscancomentarioagente )

update tr_observacion set --obscanusucreacion = :obscanusucreacion, obscanusumodificacion = :obscanusumodificacion, --obscanfeccreacion = :obscanfeccreacion, obscanfecmodificacion = :obscanfecmodificacion, --obscanestado = :obscanestado, obscancomentario = :obscancomentario, obscantipo = :obscantipo, emprcodi = :emprcodi, obscancomentarioagente = :obscancomentarioagente where obscancodi = :obscancodi
update tr_observacion set obscanestado = 'X' where obscancodi = :obscancodi

select obscancodi, obscanusucreacion, obscanusumodificacion, obscanfeccreacion, obscanfecmodificacion, obscanestado, obscancomentario, obscantipo, emprcodi, obscancomentarioagente from tr_observacion where obscancodi = :obscancodi
select obscancodi, obscanusucreacion, obscanusumodificacion, obscanfeccreacion, obscanfecmodificacion, obscanestado, obscancomentario, obscantipo, emprcodi from tr_observacion

select observacion.obscancodi, observacion.obscanusucreacion, observacion.obscanusumodificacion, observacion.obscanfeccreacion, observacion.obscanfecmodificacion, observacion.obscanestado, observacion.obscancomentario, observacion.obscantipo, observacion.emprcodi, observacion.obscancomentarioagente, empresa.emprenomb from tr_observacion observacion inner join tr_empresa_sp7 empresa on observacion.emprcodi = empresa.emprcodi where (observacion.emprcodi = '{0}' or '{0}' = '-1') and (observacion.obscanfeccreacion between to_date('{1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('{2} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) and (observacion.obscanestado != 'X') order by observacion.obscanfeccreacion desc

select distinct empresa.*, scempresa.emprcodisic, sicem.emprnomb from tr_empresa_sp7 empresa inner join tr_canal_sp7 canal on empresa.emprcodi = canal.emprcodi inner join sc_empresa scempresa on empresa.emprcodi = scempresa.emprcodi inner join si_empresa sicem on scempresa.emprcodisic = sicem.emprcodi where scempresa.emprcodisic != -1 order by sicem.emprnomb asc
select distinct zona.zonacodi, zona.zonanomb from tr_zona_sp7 zona inner join tr_canal_sp7 canal on zona.zonacodi = canal.zonacodi where canal.emprcodi = {0} or '{0}' = '-1' order by zona.zonanomb

select * from ( select canal.canalcodi, canal.canalnomb, canal.canaliccp, canal.canalunidad, canal.canalabrev,canal.canalpointtype, empresa.emprenomb, zona.zonanomb, (row_number() over (order by canal.canalcodi)) as r from tr_canal_sp7 canal inner join tr_empresa_sp7 empresa on canal.emprcodi = empresa.emprcodi inner join tr_zona_sp7 zona on canal.zonacodi = zona.zonacodi where (empresa.emprcodi = {0} or '{0}' = '-1') and (zona.zonacodi = {1} or '{1}' = '-1') and (canal.canalpointtype = '{2}' or '{2}' = '-1') and (canal.canaliccp is not null) and (upper(canal.canalnomb) like upper('%{3}%') or upper(canal.canalabrev) like upper('%{3}%') ) order by canal.canaliccp asc ) where r >= ((({4}-1) * {5}) + 1) and r < (({4} * {5}) + 1 )

select count(*) as contador from tr_canal_sp7 canal inner join tr_empresa_sp7 empresa on canal.emprcodi = empresa.emprcodi inner join tr_zona_sp7 zona on canal.zonacodi = zona.zonacodi where (empresa.emprcodi = {0} or '{0}' = '-1') and (zona.zonacodi = {1} or '{1}' = '-1') and (canal.canalpointtype = '{2}' or '{2}' = '-1') and (canal.canaliccp is not null) and (upper(canal.canalnomb) like upper('%{3}%') or upper(canal.canalabrev) like upper('%{3}%') )

select canal.canalcodi, canal.canalnomb, canal.canaliccp, canal.canalunidad, canal.canalabrev,canal.canalpointtype, empresa.emprenomb, zona.zonanomb from tr_canal_sp7 canal inner join tr_empresa_sp7 empresa on canal.emprcodi = empresa.emprcodi inner join tr_zona_sp7 zona on canal.zonacodi = zona.zonacodi where canal.canalcodi in ({0}) order by canal.canaliccp asc
update tr_observacion set obscanestado = :obscanestado where obscancodi = :obscancodi
select emprcodi, emprenomb from tr_empresa_sp7 where emprcodi = :emprcodi

select * from ( select m.*, (row_number() over (order by m.canalcodi)) as r from ( select t.*, FN_MOTIVO_DISPONIBILIDAD(t.canaliccp, t.canalpointtype, t.emprcodi, t.vercodi) as motivo from ( select c.canalcodi, c.canalnomb, c.canaliccp, c.canalunidad, c.canalabrev, c.canalpointtype, trim(z.zonanomb) as zonanomb, c.canalcritico, t.vercodi, c.emprcodi, emp.emprenomb, trunc( (t.estcnltvalido /x.revttng)*100 ,2) as estcnltvalido from tr_estadcanalr_sp7 t ,tr_canal_sp7 c,tr_zona_sp7 z,tr_reporteversion_sp7 x, tr_empresa_sp7 emp where t.canalcodi = c.canalcodi and c.zonacodi = z.zonacodi and c.emprcodi = x.emprcodi and x.revfecha = t.estcnlfecha and x.vercodi=t.vercodi and c.emprcodi = emp.emprcodi and (c.emprcodi = {0} or '{0}' = '-1') and t.vercodi=( select nvl(vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=to_date('{1}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and vernumero=(select max(vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=to_date('{1}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) ) t where (t.estcnltvalido <= 96 and t.canalcritico = 'S') or (t.estcnltvalido <= 98 and t.canalcritico != 'S') ) m ) where r >= ((({2}-1) * {3}) + 1) and r < (({2} * {3}) + 1 )

select count(*) as contador from tr_estadcanalr_sp7 t ,tr_canal_sp7 c,tr_zona_sp7 z, tr_reporteversion_sp7 x, tr_muestraris_sp7 r,tr_empresa_sp7 empresa where empresa.emprcodi = {0} and (t.estcnlfecha between to_date('{1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('{1} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) and t.canalcodi = c.canalcodi and c.zonacodi = z.zonacodi and c.emprcodi = x.emprcodi and trunc(x.revfecha) = trunc(t.estcnlfecha)
and empresa.emprcodi = c.emprcodi and trunc( (t.estcnltvalido /x.revttng)*100 ,2) < (case when (CANALCRITICO = 'S') then 96 else 98 end ) and extract(hour from (r.CANALFHORA2 - r.CANALFHORA)) *60*60+ extract(minute from (r.CANALFHORA2- r.CANALFHORA)) *60 + extract(second from (r.CANALFHORA2- r.CANALFHORA)) > case when c.canalpointtype = 'D' then 5 when c.canalpointtype = 'A' then 7 else 0 end
and trim(r.CANALICCP) = trim(c.CANALICCP)
and t.vercodi=( select nvl(vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and (verfechaini between to_date('{1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('{1} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) and vernumero=(select max(vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and (verfechaini between to_date('{1} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('{1} 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) )) order by c.canaliccp asc

select t.*, FN_MOTIVO_DISPONIBILIDAD(t.direrencia, t.canalpointtype, t.canalcalidad) as motivo from ( select r.canalfhora2, r.canalfhora, extract(hour from (r.CANALFHORA2 - r.CANALFHORA)) *60*60+ extract(minute from (r.CANALFHORA2- r.CANALFHORA)) *60 + extract(second from (r.CANALFHORA2- r.CANALFHORA)) as direrencia, r.canalcalidad, r.canaliccp, r.canalcodi, c.canalnomb, c.canalunidad, c.canalabrev, c.canalpointtype, e.emprenomb, z.zonanomb from tr_muestraris_sp7 r inner join tr_canal_sp7 c on r.canalcodi = c.canalcodi inner join tr_empresa_sp7 e on c.emprcodi = e.emprcodi inner join tr_zona_sp7 z on c.zonacodi = z.zonacodi where (r.emprcodi = {0} or '{0}' = '-1') ) t where ((direrencia >= 7 and canalpointtype = 'A') or (direrencia >= 5 and canalpointtype = 'D')) or ( canalcalidad between 48 AND 63 or canalcalidad between 112 AND 127 or canalcalidad between 176 AND 191 or canalcalidad between 240 AND 255 )

select distinct item.canalcodi from TR_OBSERVACION obs join TR_OBSERVACION_ITEM item on obs.OBSCANCODI = item.OBSCANCODI where obs.EMPRCODI = {0} and obsitefecha between sysdate-1 and sysdate and obs.obscanestado = 'P' and item.obsiteestado = 'P'
